column4: i'm trying to scp some pictures from my husband's computer. i can ssh but i forgot how to get them. can someone please remind me?
how do i get out of ssh?
Do you have access to that machine otherwise?
Do you have a user account of that name on the server?
You got lucky I saw it ;)
yes i added it about an hour ago
You can su to that user and such?
Is that user allowed to ssh into the machine?  check /etc/sshd/sshd_config (or whatever the file is named these days)
i was on that box and used sudo with his pass, yes.
